name: part_000
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】バーチャルアイドルが踊ってみた！ #かなたんしか勝たん【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [_pC9JaHyyjQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title card displaying event details for Amane Kanata's 3D LIVE.
Instrumental introduction with the title card remaining on screen.
Amane Kanata performs the song 'Animal' on a 3D stage.

subtitles.original:
4.22(Fri) 21:00
3D LIVE
バーチャルアイドルが踊ってみた！
天音かなた
ゲストは5人来るよ!!
subtitles.english:
4.22(Fri) 21:00
3D LIVE
Virtual Idol Tried Dancing!
Amane Kanata
5 guests are coming!!

subtitles.original: 剥がれ落ちたメイク　すっぴんのアニマル
subtitles.english: Makeup peeled off, a bare animal

subtitles.original: 醜くてもやっちゃうのよ
subtitles.english: I'll do it even if it's ugly

subtitles.original: おすわりとかできない　だって待ってもできない
subtitles.english: I can't sit, because I can't wait either

subtitles.original: 喉鳴らして行っちゃうまで
subtitles.english: Until I go purring

subtitles.original: イェーイ！始まったぞ！おたおめライブ！フー！
subtitles.english: Yeah! It's started! Birthday live! Whoo!

subtitles.original: みんな盛り上がって！行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Everyone get excited! Let's go!

subtitles.original: ガブッとしよっか　高まるビート
subtitles.english: Shall we take a bite? The rising beat

subtitles.original: 良いも悪いも全然しよ
subtitles.english: Let's do good and bad things altogether

subtitles.original: はまってみよっか　突破するゲート
subtitles.english: Shall we get hooked? The gate to break through

subtitles.original: 愛に期待は禁物だよ
subtitles.english: Don't expect anything from love

subtitles.original: ねえ止まれないほど狂いたい
subtitles.english: Hey, I want to go crazy enough that I can't stop

subtitles.original: 心真っ赤にしてどうしちゃったの
subtitles.english: What happened to my heart turning bright red?

subtitles.original: 痛みすらもし愛せたら
subtitles.english: If I could even love the pain

subtitles.original: あたしは幸せです
subtitles.english: I'd be happy

subtitles.original: 剥がれ落ちたメイク　すっぴんのアニマル
subtitles.english: Makeup peeled off, a bare animal

subtitles.original: 醜くてもやっちゃうのよ
subtitles.english: I'll do it even if it's ugly

subtitles.original: おすわりとかできない　だって待ってもできない
subtitles.english: I can't sit, because I can't wait either

subtitles.original: 喉鳴らして行っちゃうまで
subtitles.english: Until I go purring

subtitles.original: 牙を出し叫べ　ずっきゅんだ
subtitles.english: Show your fangs and scream. It's a "zukkyun"

subtitles.original: あたしは噛みついたら離さないや
subtitles.english: Once I bite, I won't let go

subtitles.original: 剥がれ落ちたメイク　すっぴんのアニマル
subtitles.english: Makeup peeled off, a bare animal

subtitles.original: 醜くてもやっちゃうのよ
subtitles.english: I'll do it even if it's ugly

subtitles.original: アガッちゃってよ　狂っちゃってよ
subtitles.english: Get excited, go crazy

subtitles.original: メグッちゃってよ　ンパッパッパッパ
subtitles.english: Go around, n-pa-pa-pa-pa

subtitles.original: アガッちゃってよ　狂っちゃってよ
subtitles.english: Get excited, go crazy

subtitles.original: メグッちゃってよ　ンパッパッパッパ
subtitles.english: Go around, n-pa-pa-pa-pa

subtitles.original: いやいや喰らい甲斐なくってつまんない
subtitles.english: No no, it's boring because it wasn't worth eating

subtitles.original: せめてちょっと拒んでほしかったわ
subtitles.english: I wanted you to resist at least a little

subtitles.original: 少しだけ欲張れるなら
subtitles.english: If I could be a little greedy

subtitles.original: あたしは幸せになりたいです
subtitles.english: I want to be happy

subtitles.english: Makeup peeled off, a bare animal

subtitles.english: I'll do it even if it's ugly

subtitles.english: Until I go purring

subtitles.original: 塗り重ねたメイク　ぱっちりのアニマル
subtitles.english: Layered makeup, a bright-eyed animal

subtitles.original: 目を開いて待ってるのよ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting with my eyes open

subtitles.english: I can't sit, because I can't wait either
